about_the_game:
The 52 Fragments

are an experimental, esoteric

series of games and experiences.


Beginning Nov. 1, 2023,

one fragment will be added

to the library each week for one year.


These games examine themes

related to identity, agency, perception,

and the creative process.

Fragments may change over time.

Replay is encouraged.

--

Developer Note
Throughout the course of the 52 Fragments, various parts of the game emulate actions which may appear malicious. These actions are for dramatic purposes only. The only access this game makes outside of the kind normally expected of a video game are:

  • Allowing you to search your own system with a file explorer to use as imagery on a computer screen
  • Reading your computer's hardware register to determine if your system has a game controller, CD-Rom Drive, etc.

None of the above data is ever uploaded to the internet.

--


Follow the creator for behind-the-scenes content and more:

tiktok, facebook, twitter: @dorktoast

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/VIsta/7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz P4, Dual Core 2.0 (or higher) or AMD64X2 (or higher)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 128 MB or more and should be a DirectX 9-compatible with support for Pixel Shader 2.0b (ATI Radeon X800 or higher / NVIDIA GeForce 7600 or higher / Intel HD Graphics 2000 or higher)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
